resources.string: You can add bank details in bank module to open bank account.You can deposit and withdrawal the amount through these acc.

There are different types of insurance for which you can apply: LIFE :The insurer pay sum of money in exchange for a premium upon the death of an insured person.
OFFICE :The office insurance provides protection against damage to insured property.
VEHICLE :It is for cars,trucks,motorcycles and other road vehicles.It provides financial protection against physical damage or bodily injury to vehicle.
ELECTRONIC :It offers extensive electronic devices protection.Protection in case of droppage, accidents,theft,burglary,robbery,etc.

There are different schemes in post for which you can apply: NSC : National Saving Certificate It is an Indian government savings Bond. There are two maturity period one for 5 years and other for 10 years.
KVP : Kisan Vikas Patra It is a certificate scheme.It doubles the a one time investment in a period of approx 9 years 10 months(118 months).
TD : Time Deposit It is a type of fixed deposit account that can be opened with minimum investment amt of RS 200.It can be held for a tenure ranging anywhere between 1 to 5 years.

SIP : Systematic Investment Plan In SIP investors are allow to invest small amt perodically.Investor are allocated number of units according to current Net Asset Value(NAV).
LumpSum : In Lumpsum large amt is paid in one single payment instead of installments.

Personal Finance Management is an application designed to manage your income and expenses and investments of your money . you can show all your money investment using this app. First of all you have to register your self with your Email-Id then log in your self and then you can use application . We have some different section of this application Bank,Share,Mutual funds,Post,Insurance and Daily Expense.
• In bank section there are two sub section Bank and Fixed Deposit ,In Bank section you can add your accounts,transactions from your account and you also view,edit and delete your transaction .
• In Fixed Deposit section you can add your different fd details and you can also edit and delete your fixed deposite Details.
• In shares you can add your shares details and you can also edit and delete your details .
• In mutual funds there are two sub sections sip and lumsum,you can add details according your mutual funds and you can also modify your details and delete your details.
• In Insurance there are four sub section life,office,electronic and vehical insurance you can add you insurance details and also you can modify and delete your insurance details.
• In daily expense you can add your regular expenses and you can manage your income and expenses ,And you can also show your expenses in chart form.
For more info contact on following numbers
